formalText: Gave her some random advice on the bike riding thing for her kid with training wheels.
Will see her at Friday at 4:45
She states, "I'm not sure how I feel about James leaving, but it'll be nice to have time alone".
She will have some time taking care of the kids
She hates when she puts her book down and realizes she is not with James because of feeling so sad.
He had sort of asked why she was sad.
She was not going to tell him that she'd rather be dead.
"I feel like he's taking care of me in so many ways that he wants from me or that he needs for me is for me to be okay, and I can't get up".
So her impulse is to try to cover that up and act like she okay and then she gets distant from him.
She was talking about how she loved to read as a kid and understands why her kid is so interested in the world
Said, " both of you make me be alive and that's something a part of me can really get behind and is really committed and part of me that can't" when talking about me, her counselor and James.
James is worried about her ability to be alone for a few weeks.
He got groceries and figured out what bills were going to come out the next over the next two weeks.
Talked about how in her family everyone has the same name which is confusing
Her kid has decided she will never sleep again because
Like life is way too interesting to be asleep.
